_meta.note: Updated with capital tension flag from Porter's analysis + new addressable demand assumption. Confidence levels upgraded to A/B/C/D system with evidence-based reassessment.

confidence.updated_assessment: Medium-Low — Porter's: Meta CPMs rising 27% YoY; zero switching costs = continuous re-acquisition; category creation (not capture) inflates CAC
confidence.source: Industry benchmarks + Porter's capital tension analysis
confidence.upgrade_path: Live ad testing with $5K minimum spend

confidence.updated_assessment: Low — No new evidence. Porter's: zero switching costs suggest LTV is fragile
Medium — ICP Analysis: Keto/Carnivore and Biohacker segments are subscription-friendly (identity-driven, daily use). Exhausted Professional is convenience-driven = also subscription-friendly
Low-Medium — ICP JTBD: job stickiness varies: Keto (HIGH), Wellness (MODERATE), Identity (LOW — switches with trends). No comparable marine plasma churn data
confidence.source: Industry average is 6.5% for DTC supplements + ICP JTBD analysis

confidence.updated_assessment: Medium-High — Porter's: supplier concentration risk (Actimar/Biocean oligopoly) could compress margins; alternative suppliers not yet validated
confidence.source: Preliminary supplier quotes + Porter's supplier analysis

assumptions.assumption: Addressable demand exists at current awareness

confidence.original_label: New — added from Porter's capital tension analysis
confidence.updated_assessment: Low — Marine plasma is not an established consumer category. IonWave must CREATE demand, not just capture it. This tests whether the narrow market has capturable demand at current awareness levels
confidence.upgrade_path: Initial Meta ad test targeting marine plasma / premium electrolyte keywords

capital_tension_flag.summary: $30-50K capital plan faces headwinds from rising CPMs (27% YoY), category creation costs (3-5x capture costs), and zero switching costs. Kill criteria partially address this but don't test market existence.
capital_tension_flag.source: Porter's Five Forces persona dialogue + ICP JTBD analysis
capital_tension_flag.resolution_path: Build/audit 08_Financial_Model.xlsx with scenarios linking these assumptions to revenue projections
